sourcesContent: import extractNameFromUrl from"./extractNameFromUrl";var loadImage=function(a,b){return new Promise(function(c,d){var e=new Image;e.crossOrigin="Anonymous",e.src=a,e.name=null!==b&&void 0!==b?b:extractNameFromUrl(a),e.onload=function(){c(e)},e.onerror=function(){d(new Error("Error in loading the image with the provided url: ".concat(a)))}})};export default loadImage;
